description.value: You make your foes fall painfully when you trip them. When you successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip] an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] foe, your target takes @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage. On a critical success, the target takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage plus your sneak attack damage.
